sent.orig: Even then I was in the autumn of my days, nor was it the early autumn.
sent.trans: 即使在那时；我也到了垂暮之秋，而且还不是初秋。

sent.orig: Maybe farmers are the most happy people when Autumn arrives, as Autumn means harvest for them!
sent.trans: 对于农民来说这可是他们最喜欢的季节，因为秋天意味着丰收！

sent.orig: August 15 and in the autumn the middle, so the Autumn Festival.
sent.trans: 八月十五恰在秋季的中间，故谓之中秋节。

sent.orig: A hint of autumn comes after an autumn rain.
Judy: I like autumn. Because I can eat apples in autumn.
sent.trans: 我喜欢秋天，因为在秋天我能吃到苹果。
